channel.title: Whats your most embarrasing moment?
channel.description:
Well, basically the title speaks out. Mine would be once in a race, I was really nervous because it was the Australian Championships.... I was lining up to the gate, waiting for it to drop, so it did, and all the riders quickly let the clutch out, I did and was so nervous I didn't even fan my clutch (Like pull it in a little bit every 2 seconds) And my bike grabbed traction, the bike started wheeling around, tossed me over the handlebars, and 2 other riders flipped over me, I didn't break any bones though.
My friend is sitting next to me as I type this, and he wants to add his 2 cents, so what the heck; His was last year when we were riding down watching his sister play netball in the grandfinal (There was like 90 other games too) and he was riding around, and his backwheel clipped another kids, and he went off the back, and the bike went like 10 metres in the air, and hit him in the face, they had to call all the grandfinals off to get the ambulance LOL. Oh ny the way, this was on a pushbike.

item.title: Whats your most embarrasing moment?
item.dc:creator: @junkj junkj
item.description:
@junkj wrote:

[quote=“Mopman, post:18, topic:27960”][quote author=junkj link=topic=41408.msg538163#msg538163 date=1164688027]
The most embarrising moment i had hmm…

When i didnt know what the word boycott ment…The teacher said it clearly then im like…
“Whats boycott mean?!” Every one was like carmine(im a boy)!!Gosh she just said it!!OMG!!
Then the teacher was like…“im not gonna tolerate that in my class”
Then im like in my mind “WTF DOES IT MEAN?!!”

Thats it!
[/quote]

What the fuck did you just say? Something about cockroaches and the tower of london? Jesus christ boy, make sense.[/quote]

…the whole post is for what boycott meant. And everyone started yelling at me.

She was talking about stores…weird!

Read full topic
